alert.note: Alert for Lee; Terrell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lee and Terrell Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Dawson, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dawson, Leesburg, Smithville, Sasser, Bronwood, Parrott, Bridges Crossroad, Herod, Jordan Place, Yeomans, Dawson Municipal A/P, Graves, Oakville, Chambliss, Olivers Mill, Neyami and Chickasawhatchee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
